Package gui.controller

Class MovingObjectFunctionalityController

java.lang.Object
gui.controller.MovingObjectFunctionalityController
public class MovingObjectFunctionalityController
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements all the actions that are possible when moving around e. g. selecting a vehicle, exiting and entering or unload grain to the silo or sell it at the court trade.
Author:
Judith

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private LSButton BUTTON_ACTION
    the buttonAction of the actual SideControlPane object
    private int columnExited
    integer to store the index of the column to which the farmer exited the tractor
    private int columnToFillFromHarvester
    integer that stores the column on the right side of the exited tractor and that is needed to proof if the harvester is standing on the correct side of the tractor
    private LSButton CULTIVATOR_BUTTON
    the cultivatorButton of the actual SideControlPane object
    private LSButton DUMP_TRUCK_BUTTON
    the dumpTruckButton of the actual SideControlPane object
    private int exitedObject
    integer that stores the number of the exited object
    private int exitedVehicleX
    integer to store on which column the exited tractor is placed
    private int exitedVehicleY
    integer to store on which row the exited tractor is placed
    private LSButton FARMER_CUTTON
    the farmerButton of the actual SideControlPane object
    private GameScene GAME_SCENE
    the actual GameScene object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game
    private LSButton HARVESTER_BUTTON
    the harvesterButton of the actual SideControlPane object
    private Matchfield MATCHFIELD
    the actual Matchfield object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game
    private double rotation
    rotation of the image view if the exited tractor
    private int rowExited
    integer to store the index of the row to which the farmer exited the tractor
    private int rowToFillFromHarvester
    integer that stores the row on the right side of the exited tractor and that is needed to proof if the harvester is standing on the correct side of the tractor
    private LSButton SEED_DRILL_BUTTON
    the seedDrillButton of the actual SideControlPane object
    private SideControlPane SIDE_CONTROL_PANE
    the actual SideControlPane object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game
    private LSButton TRACTOR_BUTTON
    the tractorButton of the actual SideControlPane object
    private boolean tractorExited
    boolean that stores the information if the farmer exited the tractor on the matchfield

  • Method Details

    • proofActionButtonFunctionality

      protected void proofActionButtonFunctionality​(int column, int row, MovingObject movingObject, GameValue gameValue, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill, FieldTile fieldTile, Silo silo, CourtTrade courtTrade)
      This method check if an action is possible and calls it.
      Parameters:
      column - integer of the column on which the moving object is standing
      row - integer of the row on which the moving object is standing
      movingObject - the MovingObjet object of the actual game
      gameValue - the GameValue object of the actual game
      farmer - the Farmer object of the actual game
      tractor - the Tractor object of the actual game
      harvester - the Harvester object of the actual game
      cultivator - the Cultivator object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game
      seedDrill - the SeedDrill object of the actual game
      fieldTile - the FieldTile object of the actual game
      silo - the Silo object of the actual game
      courtTrade - the CourtTrade object of the actual game

    • selectVehicle

      private void selectVehicle​(MovingObject movingObject, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill)
      This method implements the functionality to select a vehicle or go back to the farmer at the barn. Therefore, the buttons on the pane on the right side are used. This method implements the functionality to choose the farmer or the harvester.
      Parameters:
      movingObject - the MovingObject object of the actual game
      farmer - the Farmer object of the actual game
      tractor - the Tractor object of the actual game
      harvester - the Harvester object of the actual game
      cultivator - the Cultivator object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game
      seedDrill - the SeedDtrill object of the actual game

    • selectWorkingDevice

      private void selectWorkingDevice​(MovingObject movingObject, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill)
      This method implements the functionality to select a working device if the tractor is selected at the barn. Therefore, the buttons on the pane on the right side are used. This method implements the functionality to choose the tractor and one of the working devices.
      Parameters:
      movingObject - the MovingObject object of the actual game
      farmer - the Farmer object of the actual game
      tractor - the Tractor object of the actual game
      harvester - the Harvester object of the actual game
      cultivator - the Cultivator object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game
      seedDrill - the SeedDrill object of the actual game

    • setMovingObjectsSelected

      private void setMovingObjectsSelected​(boolean farmerSelected, boolean tractorSelected, boolean harvesterSelected, boolean cultivatorSelected, boolean dumpTruckSelected, boolean seedDrillSelected, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill)
      This method helps to set the different objects selected or not selected.
      Parameters:
      farmerSelected - boolean that is true if the farmer is selected
      tractorSelected - boolean that is true if the tractor is selected
      harvesterSelected - boolean that is true if the harvester is selected
      cultivatorSelected - boolean that is true if the cultivator is selected
      dumpTruckSelected - boolean that is true if the dumpTruck is selected
      seedDrillSelected - boolean that is true if the seedDrill is selected
      farmer - the Farmer object of the actual game
      tractor - the Tractor object of the actual game
      harvester - the Harvester object of the actual game
      cultivator - the Cultivator object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game
      seedDrill - the SeedDrill object of the actual game

    • sellGrain

      private void sellGrain​(DumpTruck dumpTruck, GameValue gameValue, CourtTrade courtTrade)
      This method implements the functionality to sell grain at the courtTrade.
      Parameters:
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game
      gameValue - the gameValue object of the actual game
      courtTrade - the CourtTrade object of the actual game

    • buyField

      private void buyField​(GameValue gameValue, GameScene gameScene, FieldTile fieldTile)
      This method implements the functionality to buy a field at the courtTrade.
      Parameters:
      gameValue - the GameValue object of the actual game
      gameScene - the GameScene object of the actual game
      fieldTile - the FieldTile object of the actual game

    • fillTank

      private void fillTank​(GameValue gameValue, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester)
      This method implements the functionality to fill the petrol tank of the tractor and the harvester at the gasStation.
      Parameters:
      gameValue - the GameValue object of the actual game
      tractor - the Tractor object of the actual game
      harvester - the Harvester object of the actual game

    • unloadToDumpTruck

      private void unloadToDumpTruck​(Harvester harvester, DumpTruck dumpTruck)
      This method implements the functionality to unload the grain tank of the harvester to the dumpTruck.
      Parameters:
      harvester - the Harvester object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game

    • getObjectExited

      private int getObjectExited​(Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill)
      This method checks if a and which of the working devices is attached when exiting the tractor. Depending on that it sets and returns an integer and sets the button of the working device disbaled and the working device itself not selected anymore.
      Parameters:
      cultivator - the Cultivator object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game
      seedDrill - the SeedDrill object of the actual game
      Returns:
      an integer that is set depending on the attached working device

    • setExitedIntegers

      private void setExitedIntegers​(double rotation, MovingObject movingObject)
      This method sets the variable columnExited and rowExited when exiting the tractor as well as the variables exitedVehicleX and exitedVehicleY. As the farmer exits the tractor on the left side the column and the row to which he exits depend on the direction.
      Parameters:
      rotation - rotation of the tractor
      movingObject - the MovingObject object of the actual game

    • exitVehicle

      private void exitVehicle​(MovingObject movingObject, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill)
      This method implements the functionality to exit the tractor.
      Parameters:
      movingObject - the MovingObject object of the actual game
      farmer - the Farmer object of the actual game
      tractor - the Tractor object of the actual game
      cultivator - the Cultivator object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game
      seedDrill - the SeedDrill object of the actual game

    • setIntegersToFillFromHarvester

      private void setIntegersToFillFromHarvester​(double rotation, MovingObject movingObject)
      This method sets the variables columnToFillFromHarvester and rowToFillFromHarvester. As the harvester has to be on the right side of the tractor the values integers are set depending on the direction the tractor is facing to.
      Parameters:
      rotation - rotation of the tractor
      movingObject - the MovingObject object of the actual game

    • initializeSecondMovingObject

      private void initializeSecondMovingObject​(MovingObject movingObject, Tractor tractor)
      This method implements a second image view that holds the image of the exited tractor and eventually of the attached working device.
      Parameters:
      movingObject - the MovingObject object of the actual game
      tractor - the Tractor object of the actual game

    • changeToFarmerAfterExited

      private void changeToFarmerAfterExited​(MovingObject movingObject, Farmer farmer)
      This method helps to exit the tractor by changing the moving object back to the farmer. The farmer has to be placed on the left side of the tractor and set selected.
      Parameters:
      movingObject - the MovingObject object of the actual game
      farmer - the Farmer object of the actual game

    • enterVehicle

      private void enterVehicle​(MovingObject movingObject, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill)
      This method implements the functionality to enter the tractor after exiting it.
      Parameters:
      movingObject - the MovingObject object of the actual game.
      farmer - the Farmer object of the actual game
      tractor - the Tractor object of the actual game
      cultivator - the Cultivator object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game
      seedDrill - the SeedDrill object of the actual game

    • removeSecondMovingObject

      private void removeSecondMovingObject​(MovingObject movingObject, Farmer farmer)
      This method removes the image view of the exited tractor and sets the farmer not selected anymore.
      Parameters:
      movingObject - the MovingObject object of the actual game
      farmer - the Farmer object of the actual game

    • changeBackToExitedVehicle

      private void changeBackToExitedVehicle​(MovingObject movingObject, Tractor tractor, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill)

      tractor - the Tractor object of the actual game
      cultivator - the Cultivator object of the actual game
      dumpTruck - the DumpTruck object of the actual game
      seedDrill - the SeedDrill object of the actual game
